newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.010 pts to 99.646.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.010 pts to 99.646.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.010 points in Monday's trading to 99.646, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.008 points to 2.297 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, fell 0.004 points to 95.802, the bank said, while the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.009 points to 2.389 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 fell 1.619 points to 1,191.446.
